synopsis: Takeru Myojin is visited by the evil Emperor Zule of Planet Gishin, who claims to be his father in his dreams. In his dream, Emperor Zule reveals Takeru was sent to Earth to destroy it, but Takeru rejects his orders and brushes it off as just a dream.

To find out the truth, Takeru visits his parents’ home. There, his father, Professor Myojin reveals Takeru is not his biological son. Suddenly, his parents’ home comes under attack by another assassin from Planet Gishin, who possesses Esper powers.
